payee.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: the person or organization to whom money, especially a cheque, must be paid
payee.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: the person or organization to whom money, especially a cheque, must be paid
payee.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: The Eurocheque is free of charge to its payee.
Reports can show transactions by date, amount or payee.
payee.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: a phrase written on a cheque to show it can only be paid into the account held by the person whose name is written on the cheque
